name: Endless Rampage: Whack-a-mole game
description: The o' Monsters are back. Faster, meaner and tougher than ever.  How long can you stand the onslaught of o' Monsters? They are definitely out for revenge as the townspeople seem to be getting too many heroes to save the day. You have the same artillery but they don't care. How long can you last? Top the leader board and be eligible for #flashrewards! Visit https://flamationstudios.com for more information. God be with you warrior!
